com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element

Class SeleniumWMessageBoxWebElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWComponentWebElement
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWMessageBoxWebElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext, org.openqa.selenium.TakesScreenshot, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement

    public class SeleniumWMessageBoxWebElement
extends SeleniumWComponentWebElement
    A Selenium WebElement which models the output of WMessages.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Mark Reeves
